repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

body: Thanks, yeah, this API was renamed in an API review, but I forgot to update the [Obsolete] message... Submitted #29991 to fix.

rename.to: Obsoletion message for AutoTransactionsEnabled is wrong

issue.title: [release/7.0] Correct [Obsolete] message for AutoTransactionBehavior

repository.name: efcore
repository.description: EF Core is a modern object-database mapper for .NET. It supports LINQ queries, change tracking, updates, and schema migrations.

issue.body:
Fixes #29990, backports #29991

**Description**

An [Obsolete] attribute message points to the wrong replacement API.

**Customer impact**

It's harder for users to figure out which new API to use instead of the obsoleted API.

**How found**

Customer report on 7.0.

**Regression**

No.

**Testing**

No testing necessary, this is a pure string message fix.

**Risk**

Zero; this is a pure obsoletion message fix.
